examples: He had been a talented musician in his youth.
Había sido un músico talentoso en su juventud.
She regrets that she spent her youth travelling and not studying.
Lamenta haber pasado su juventud viajando y no estudiando.
He joked that being good at cards was the sign of a misspent youth (= having wasted his time when he was young).
Bromeó diciendo que ser bueno en las cartas era el signo de una juventud malgastada (= haber perdido el tiempo cuando era joven).
